HeaderAppBar.HeaderAppBar_Title: CV and Portfolio of A. Trygve Horn

AboutMe.EastLondon: I was born in East London, South Africa, in ‘76. The area was nature-on-steroids, teeming with wild animals, jungle-like plantlife, and warm rivers and oceans. It was an amazing place in which to be a child.
AboutMe.CapeTown: In high school I moved to Cape Town - Still beautiful, but not quite as wild. With Table Mountain, more nightlife, amazing food and its tourist culture, Cape Town was a great place in which to be a young adult.
AboutMe.BucketList: Life in South Africa gave me the opportunity to experience and be a part of some pretty amazing things, many of which seemed mundane at the time:
AboutMe.BucketList_Item_1: I have climbed cliffs and jumped off waterfalls
AboutMe.BucketList_Item_2: I have held a black mamba snake
AboutMe.BucketList_Item_3: I lived through the end of Apartheid…
AboutMe.Germany: In 2010, my wife and I moved to Germany. Germany is a beautiful country, though the nature is tamer, quieter. I miss the wildness of South Africa, but there is a lot to appreciate about Germany. Germany is so much safer than South Africa, and after many years of living in Germany I finally feel safe in my home. Germany has a far more sophisticated, if broken, public transport system. And in Germany, if you need medical care, you will get it.
AboutMe.Work: I taught English for several years, and now I’m ready to go back into development. I completed a full-stack coding bootcamp and I look forward to developing apps and websites, and learning new skills along the way.
